oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Approximation algorithms for the Bipartite Multicut problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KENKRE, S
VISHWANATHAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: approximation algorithms
bipartite multicut
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce the Bipartite Multicut problem. This is a generalization of the st-Mincut problem is similar to the Multicut problem and also turns out to be an immediate generalization of the Min UnCut problem. We prove that this problem is NP-hard and then present an SDP based approximation algorithm. The SDP based approximation algorithm uses the structure theorem of l(2)(2) metrics along with region growing techniques. .
